info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 9:04PM CDT until March 29 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Green Bay WI
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 2 and 5 inches and ice accumulations between one quarter and four tenths of an inch.
* WHERE...Vilas County.
* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM CDT Saturday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 7 PM Saturday to 7 PM CDT Sunday.
* IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice and heavy snow Saturday night into Sunday. Travel could be nearly impossible.
info.instruction:
Be prepared for slippery roads tonight. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
Travel is strongly discouraged for Saturday night and Sunday. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Be prepared for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

parameter.value: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY
